Desc.entry: Supports older people in the area of Abbeydale. Runs classes in sewing and English as an Additional Language. All welcome. May run other classes depending on funding.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Tues & Wed 9.30-11.30am (English as an Additional Language), 1-3pm (sewing)

category.entry: EDUCATION - TRAINING PROVIDERS AND EMPLOYMENT SUPPORT
